mistral:7b-instruct: This EPO plan from Queensland Country Health fits your profile as it offers comprehensive coverage for your chronic conditions (diabetes, hypertension, hyperlipidemia) with a $500,000 coverage limit for hospitalization, outpatient services, and prescription drugs. The monthly premium of $300 is relatively affordable given your middle income bracket. Additionally, this plan provides preventive care services which are essential for managing your conditions effectively. With a maximum out-of-pocket expense of $6500, you are protected from high unexpected medical costs. Compared to other plans, this one offers the best balance between coverage and affordability given your specific health needs and risk level (100). However, remember that this plan excludes cosmetic procedures and experimental treatments, so it's crucial to consult with your healthcare provider before making any decisions.
